briefTitle: Treating Violence-Prone Substance Use Disorder Patients

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Entering VA substance use disorder treatment
* past-year violence
* cognitively intact

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not entering VA substance use disorder treatment
* no past-year violence
* cognitively not intact

outcomeMeasures.title: Addiction Severity Index Legal Composite
outcomeMeasures.description: Scores range from 0 to 1, with higher scores indicating more severe legal problems.
